prog: (Maxima) h(n) := sum(sum(binomial(k,r) *sum(binomial(r,m) *sum(binomial(m,j) *binomial(j,n-m-k-j-r) *(-1)^(n-m-k-j-r), j,0,m), m,0,r), r,0,k), k,1,n); a(n):=h(n)-h(n-1); \\ _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Sep 10 2010
